name: nostr-social-duck
description: Nostr Social Graph Analysis library using DuckDB for efficient graph operations
author: Gzuuus

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --external "@duckdb/node-bindings-linux-x64/duckdb.node" --external "@duckdb/node-bindings-linux-arm64/duckdb.node" --external "@duckdb/node-bindings-darwin-arm64/duckdb.node" --external "@duckdb/node-bindings-darwin-x64/duckdb.node" --external "@duckdb/node-bindings-win32-x64/duckdb.node" && bun tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declarationMap false
scripts.release: bun run build && bun changeset publish
